Server.Name: Outback Roadies (V1.0)
Server.Description:
Outback Roadies is a post-poco mod with an Australian theme.
Features Include: - Custom Entities and Vehicles from the EndZ creators May Red and Thee Legion - Built-in Unique Hand Crafted 10K Australia World by FluffyPanda - Integration for the NPC Mod and includes Spider Add On Pack - Community Quality of Life Mods - Optional Mods folder with larger backpack and other customising features - Custom Aussie recipes for greater immersion - Additional Game Menu option value features such as 96 Entity Horde Night - and a few other bits...
